snippet: No one in the know is talking, but there's been plenty of excitement to the rumor that Barbra Streisand will give a concert at the new Barclays Center arena.
abstract: No one in the know is talking, but there's been plenty of excitement to the rumor that Barbra Streisand will give a concert at the new Barclays Center arena.

headline.main: Teases of a Streisand Return to Brooklyn
